response:
"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verkaufen? gibt es keine gesetze, die uns vor solchen practices schützen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? are there no laws that protect us from such practices? #dataprivacy #privacy"

this post critically examines the issue of companies collecting and selling personal data without proper consent or regard for privacy. it questions the lack of effective laws and regulations to protect individuals' personal information, highlighting the need for better data protection practices. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy) and #privatsphäre (privacy) are used to reach a wider audience and spark discussion on the topic.
